price: Na pia ili Mwenyezi Mungu awasafishe walio amini na awafutilie mbali makafiri.
arabic: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَمۡحَقَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: Kwa huku kushindwa kwa muda, Mwenyezi Mungu anawasafisha jamaa Waumini, na anawat'ahirisha kutokana na wale wenye nyoyo mbaya na imani dhaifu, na wenye kueneza moyo wa kushindwa na wasiwasi; na kwa hivyo ndio anaung'olea mbali ukafiri na makafiri wenyewe pia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waliyumaḥḥiṣa al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayamḥaqa al-kāfirīna
